description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

If you have a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cA0NuGh484BwlDjX]{drone}, you can grant the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.PecEOjojT15BJKi9]{haste} to your drone for 1 minute as a move action.

If you have an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cM54UpNXExgDSbq4]{exocortex}, you can gain the effects of haste for 1 minute as a move action.

Once you or your drone has used this ability, you cannot use it again until you spend 1 Resolve Point to regain Stamina Points from a 10-minute rest. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.s8QuUMHbPDfYEJ1k]{overclocking} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.fCrvMgmCaALorrZW]{hyperclocking} mechanic tricks to learn this trick.
